rawMetadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.24-develop.2024.4.20+commit.352c6023"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"inputs":[{"components":[{"internalType":"address","name":"target","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"value","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"data","type":"bytes"}],"internalType":"struct AuthorizedTransfer.Call[]","name":"calls","type":"tuple[]"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"commitEncoded","type":"bytes"},{"internalType":"uint8","name":"v","type":"uint8"},{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"r","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"s","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"address","name":"owner","type":"address"}],"name":"authorisedInvokeTransfer","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"commit","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"getDigest","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"digest","type":"bytes32"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"kind":"dev","methods":{"getDigest(bytes32)":{"details":"signing `digest` authorizes this contact to execute code on behalf of the signer      the logic of the inheriting contract should encode rules which respect the information within `commit`the authorizer includes `commit` in their signature to ensure the authorized contract will only execute intended actions(s).      the Invoker logic MUST implement constraints on the contract execution based on information in the `commit`;      otherwise, any EOA that signs an AUTH for the Invoker will be compromisedper EIP-3074, digest = keccak256(MAGIC || chainId || paddedInvokerAddress || commit)","params":{"commit":"- any 32-byte value used to commit to transaction validity conditions"},"returns":{"digest":"- sign the `digest` to authorize the invoker to execute the `calls`"}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"getDigest(bytes32)":{"notice":"produce a digest for the authorizer to sign"}},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"src/AuthorizedTransfer.sol":"AuthorizedTransfer"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[":ds-test/=lib/forge-std/lib/ds-test/src/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":solady/=lib/solady/src/"]},"sources":{"src/AuthorizedTransfer.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb3a4585e884fdf88afbff2539ab33436bb876d9abc97551ab9213f5c514a5131","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://26c0e8ab55b189c0a8e46bb7f6d8c1de72d009acccdbe87a0f327d02c586b345","dweb:/ipfs/QmY7MeT4z896GWQMkDWNMjmGoL2znnzC2ke7jSFLsDUja4"]},"src/BaseAuth.sol":{"keccak256":"0x362173970152f06eb3d630d13dcbe8c230058590be9c4fb482ce831693f27427","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://dc723b36f7f95314b541727045b65cebe98b186ffabd998a76173ff891533c06","dweb:/ipfs/QmQZrJNvDKPs6gVb1khyhFRfLWLh3SmcFG5bM4rgUxtcVw"]}},"version":1}

getDigest(bytes32).details: signing `digest` authorizes this contact to execute code on behalf of the signer      the logic of the inheriting contract should encode rules which respect the information within `commit`the authorizer includes `commit` in their signature to ensure the authorized contract will only execute intended actions(s).      the Invoker logic MUST implement constraints on the contract execution based on information in the `commit`;      otherwise, any EOA that signs an AUTH for the Invoker will be compromisedper EIP-3074, digest = keccak256(MAGIC || chainId || paddedInvokerAddress || commit)

params.commit: - any 32-byte value used to commit to transaction validity conditions

returns.digest: - sign the `digest` to authorize the invoker to execute the `calls`

getDigest(bytes32).notice: produce a digest for the authorizer to sign
